summary: Picks various kinds of nit, takes care of shadeMe's minor quibbles with the game and fixes a bug or two in the process.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#FF8C00]Nitpick[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3][color=#9ACD32][b]Come, pick...[/b][/color][/size]
[b]version 6.0[/b]

[size=3][b]Requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]Skyrim Script Extender[/url][/b][/size][/center]


[size=5][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size]

This mod picks various kinds of nit, takes care of shadeMe's minor quibbles with the game and fixes a bug or two in the process.

List of picked nit:[list]
[*][size=2]Removed the 255-character limit placed on string values in Skyrim’s INI files.[/size]
[*][size=2]Fixed the bug that prevented active mod files from loading at start-up if there were more than 508 ESP/ESM files in the Data directory.[/size]
[/list]


[size=5][b][u]Fine Print[/u][/b][/size]

Just pop it in and run the game through the SKSE launcher.



[size=5][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u][/size]

Compatible only with TES Skyrim v1.9.32.0. May not be compatible with the Russian build of the game.



[size=5][b][u]Credits[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#F4A460][i]Special thanks[/i][/color] to :
[list]
[*][size=2]Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly (The SKSE Team) – Words fail me when I attempt to extol these guys for th-heir c-contributio... to ..he TES modd..n. com.i..t...[/size]
[*][size=2]LHammonds – For his Readme generator.[/size]
[*][size=2]Lojack – For curating the first publicly released build.[/size]
[/list]
The Rest of the Modding Community – For the inspiration I needed to start modding and all the wonderful mods which I use.
Bethesda – For providing a rather malleable game.



[size=5][u][b]Change Log[/b][/u][/size]

[spoiler][quote]6.0 - Updated for v1.9.32.0.
5.0 – Updated for v1.8.151.0.
4.0 – Updated for v1.7.7.0.
3.0 - Updated for v1.6.89.0.
2.0 - Updated for v1.5.26.0, fixed the vanilla bug that prevented active plugins from being loaded at start-up if there were more than 508 plugin/master files in the Data directory.
1.0 – Initial Release.[/quote][/spoiler]
author: shadeMe
